#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int t, m, n, i, j, x1, y1, x2, y2, k, sum;	

	scanf("%d %d", &m, &n );
	
	vector< vector<int> > A( m + 1, vector<int>( n + 1 ) );

	for( i = 1;i <= m;i++ )
		for( j = 1;j <= n;j++ )
			scanf("%d", &A[ i ][ j ] );

	scanf("%d", &t );
	
	for( i = 1;i <= t;i++ ) {
		
		scanf("%d %d %d %d", &x1, &y1, &x2, &y2 );
		
		sum = 0;
		
		for( j = x1; j <= x2;j++ )
			for( k = y1;k <= y2;k++ )
				sum += A[ j ][ k ];

		printf("%d\n", sum );	
	}
	
	return 0;
}
